trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEQ_00<tab>Deitrich wishes to reaffirm your desire to join the Alchemists' Guild.

TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEQ_01<tab>For the final stage of your enrollment, you are to seek approval from the guildmaster. Approach Severian where he toils over his workbench within the Alchemists' Guild.
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEQ_02<tab>Severian has approved your initiation into the Alchemists' Guild. Equip the weathered alembic and speak with the guildmaster once more.
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Guildmaster Severian.
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_DEITRICH_000<tab>Have you arrived at a decision? Are you ready to exult in the arts of alchemy and commit to the responsibilities that your enrollment entails?
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_DEITRICH_010<tab>I understand: the thought of drowning in the bottomless seas of alchemical possibility must be quite intimidating. Take your time to mull it over.
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_DEITRICH_020<tab>Excellent. Then allow me to direct you to our guildmaster. Gaining his approval is the last test you must pass before becoming a full member of the guild.
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_DEITRICH_021<tab>You will find Guildmaster Severian tending to his experiments at his personal workbench.
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_DEITRICH_022<tab>I must warn you, he is a rather <var 1A 02 /var>intense<var 1A 01 /var> individual. Pray choose your words with care.
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEVERIAN_000<tab>What!? What is it this time!? Ah, you must be the merchant's lackey, come to bring me my imp wings. Let's have them, then!
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEVERIAN_001<tab>Hm? Not a lackey? An aspiring alchemist, did you say? Speak up, and pray that I heard you awry!
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_Q1_1<tab>Are you an aspiring alchemist?
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_A1_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_A1_2<tab>No

TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEVERIAN_010<tab><sniff> That is well. I have not the time to attend to the fumbling of inept initiates. Now, I know not what ill-advised notion brought you to my desk, but I'll thank you not to interrupt my work again!
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEVERIAN_020<tab>Did that babbling fool Deitrich send you to me? I specifically requested that I be disturbed for nothing less than the coming of a second Calamity!
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEVERIAN_021<tab>Do I appear as a kindly mentor to you? My research demands my absolute and undivided attention! Now, begone, before I am forced to─
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEVERIAN_022<tab>But wait. Hmmm, perhaps I can... Yes, yes, you may be the very <var 1A 02 /var>assistant<var 1A 01 /var> I require.

TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEVERIAN_023<tab>I have had a change of heart. Congratulations, I approve your application to the guild. It is with great pleasure that I welcome a fellow seeker of knowledge into the fold!

TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SEVERIAN_024<tab>We can dispense with the interminable initiation ceremony, yes? Here is your first alembic. Try not to drop it, for there is much work to be done. Yes, much work!
TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SYSTEM_030<tab>You have unlocked a new class! You can change to this class at any time by equipping the tool received from this quest.

TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SYSTEM_031<tab>When changing classes, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gear sets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will allow you to register and save your equipment. You may then use them to switch between classes instantly without the need to manually equip weapons or equipment.

TEXT_CLSALC011_00575_SYSTEM_032<tab>A button for the Gear Set interface is located in the upper portion of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window.
